_sText: !!!!!IMPORTANT!!!!! This map will only run on your server if you have already installed Rally Race Mod. Here's the Link if not Rally Race Mod This map took me about 5 hours to complete, kinda short fun map, lots of obstacles along the way. Any problems with the map please tell me! Thanks to Karatekaefer for mpa03 Komaokc for komaokc's big ass texture pack .Eric for Metal Textures And to the best clan in the world Kaosservers Beta Testers -AcDc -Dissconnected -Blackfoot -Tomgreen -NONAME Please rate and comment hope you enjoy! ***EDIT*** Fixed it i think, srry about that i have lots of textures very hard to get the right one most of the time hopefully it works for you know enjoy!
